results.text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It does not dishonor others, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
results.reason: Describes the characteristics and actions of true love.
results.reflection: True love is patient, kind, humble, and enduring.

results.text: Greater love has no one than this: to lay down one’s life for one’s friends.
results.reason: Highlights the sacrificial nature of love.
results.reflection: The greatest love is shown through selfless sacrifice.

results.text: We love because he first loved us.
results.reason: Emphasizes that our ability to love comes from God's love for us.
results.reflection: Our capacity to love others is rooted in God's love for us.

results.text: But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
results.reason: Illustrates the depth of God's love through Christ's sacrifice.
results.reflection: God's love is unconditional and sacrificial.

results.text: Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.
results.reason: Encourages believers to love one another as an expression of knowing God.
results.reflection: Our love for others is a reflection of our relationship with God.
